name: California Vernacular
description: California Vernacular is all about the Southern California landscape and what it is to live in the land of golden dreamers. This 9-x-6-inch, 80-page, softcover book, designed by Clifton Burt, includes 60 full-color photographs and has been published in an edition of 250. Each copy is hand-numbered and signed.

name: Print + Free Copy of California Vernacular
description: I’ve editioned a print from my California Vernacular series through collect.give and pledged to donate 100% of the proceeds to the American Civil Liberties Union when the edition sells out. This is an archival pigment print on 8½-x-11-inch paper, in an edition of 20, numbered and signed on the verso. With your purchase of the print, you’ll get a FREE copy of my limited-edition California Vernacular book. California Vernacular is all about the Southern California landscape and what it is to live in the land of golden dreamers. This 9-x-6-inch, 80-page softcover book, designed by Clifton Burt, includes 60 full-color photographs and has been published in an edition of 250. Each copy is hand-numbered and signed.
